DOC.brief_summary: The aim study develop Internet-based self-help therapy program insomnia Chinese language , conduct randomize waiting-list control trial efficacy Internet-based self-help therapy insomnia .
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial patient insomnia . Eligible subject randomly assign self-help treatment telephone consultation ( SHTC ) , self-help treatment without telephone consultation ( SH ) , waiting-list control . The subject receive self-help treatment per week 6 consecutive week . In addition self-help treatment , subject SHTC group receive telephone consultation per week 6 consecutive week .
DOC.criteria: Hong Kong resident age â‰¥18 year Predominant complaint difficulty initiate maintain sleep early morning awaken nonrestorative sleep associate distress impairment social , occupational important area function least 3 night per week least 3 month base self administer questionnaire Able read Chinese type Chinese English Have Internet access ( PC/ mobile phone ) , email address Willing give inform consent comply trial protocol Have suicidal idea base selfreport
